thread.section_title: The Connaught - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A hi standard , upgraded on details
thread.title_full: A hi standard , upgraded on details - Review of The Connaught, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: rhamba k
title: A hi standard , upgraded on details
text:
Lovely, attentive service from front doors to the bars and restaurant.
After a harrying day - its good to seek the deep hush in the plush quiet of this hotel.
The spa, fab pool, the food all top top.
Bamford bath products are good and smell great.
A century. Plus hotel os staying in step with lux in the 21st C.
